mapper.select: SELECT com_account_name, payment_way, close_day, company_id, hf_type, hf_com_account, com_start_month, end_month, end_type, submit_remark AS 'remark' FROM hf_com_task WHERE is_active = 1 AND task_category IN (1, 2) AND hf_type = #{hfType} AND company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY created_time LIMIT 0,1
